name: Best of Board Games
description:
Chess, Mah-jong, Solitaire: rediscover 3 timeless classics with this Best of Board Games compilation.
Try out these updated classics, for both beginners and experts!
Play with chessmen modeled in 3D, a brand new Mah-jong mode, and many types of Solitaire (Freecell, Solitaire, Spider, Pyramid and Golf).
Check the tutorials at any time to familiarize yourself with the games. Test your abilities, progress through Adventure mode, and take on the many different trials of Challenge mode.
Bonuses, tips, original game modes, challenges and even the chance to take on real opponents in chess thanks to an asynchronous multiplayer mode will make playing Best of Board Games an unforgettable experience!
Purchasing this content entitles you to both the PS3™ and “PS Vita” versions!
1 player
116KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
